posts.post_title: SGC and PSA OLD JUDGES AVAILABLE 50+ 10% OFF
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason Duncan
Hey guys.  

I have decided to liquidate the OJs.  These are all graded by SGC or PSA and 1 BVG.  Alot of the low grade ones have great eye appeal on the fronts.  I am listing the prices that I intend on putting these in ebay store for.  I am going to try here first to give opportunity to liquidate off ebay so take 10% off of these prices.  Keep in mind most prices reflect what I paid considering eye appeal.  First emails to me personally committed takes the card.  Here we go:
